c2summary: Turn on the screen when you pick up your phone.

c1title: Double tap to turn on screen
c2summary: Turn on the screen when you double tap it.

c1title: Double tap to turn off screen
c2summary: Double tap an empty space on the Home or Lock screen.

c1title: Palm touch to turn off screen
c2summary: Cover the screen with your palm to turn it off. This won't work while the keyboard is displayed.
Keep the screen on while you're looking at it, using the front camera to detect your face.
Share pictures and videos by shaking your phone while a friend shakes theirs.
Swipe the edge of your hand across the screen to take a screenshot.
Mute incoming calls and alarms by putting your hand over the screen or turning your phone face down.
Protect your phone from accidental touches when it's in a dark place, such as a pocket or bag.

c1title: Suggest actions and replies for notifications

c2summary: Sign in to a second account in your favorite social apps.
Control the media volume by default when you press the Volume keys.
Reduce battery usage by analyzing Wi-Fi traffic patterns.
